title: Constraints of experimentation in child dev

content.question: Which of the following statements explains why it is difficult to experiment with human development?

choices.label: The genes of identical twins are not similar enough for statistics.
Direct long-term manipulation of a child’s environment would be unethical.
Experiments with small children are always unethical.
Identifying what genetic traits are interacting with the environment is impossible.

content.answer: Direct long-term manipulation of a child’s environment would be unethical.
